Containers.Name: binhex-fdroidserver
Containers.Overview:
[b]Description[/b] fdroidserver is a suite of tools to publish and work with collections of Android apps (APK files) and other kinds of packages. It is used to maintain the f-droid.org application repository. These same tools can be used to create additional or alternative repositories for publishing, or to assist in creating, testing and submitting metadata to the f-droid.org repository, also known as fdroiddata.
[b]Configuration[/b] [b]/config[/b] This is the container path to your configuration files, database and logs etc.
[b]Documentation[/b] https://github.com/binhex/documentation[br]
[b]Notes[/b] N/A
Containers.DonateText: If you appreciate my work, then please consider buying me a beer :D
